inputs.name: contractsRootFolder
inputs.label: Contracts root folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the folder that contains the input binaries

inputs.name: contractsFileName
inputs.label: Contracts files name
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of the names of the binaries to compare, separated by space

inputs.name: implFolder
inputs.label: Implementation assemblies folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sub directory inside the package folder where the binary can be found

inputs.name: failOnIssue
inputs.label: Fails on Issues
inputs.helpMarkDown: If issues are found when comparing, the task will fail

inputs.name: resolveFx
inputs.label: Resolve Fx
inputs.helpMarkDown: If a contract or implementation dependency cannot be found in the given directories, fallback to try to resolve against the framework directory on the machine

inputs.name: warnOnIncorrectVersion
inputs.label: Warn on incorrect version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Warn if the contract version number doesn't match the found implementation version number

inputs.name: warnOnMissingAssemblies
inputs.label: Warn on missing assemblies
inputs.helpMarkDown: Warn if the contract assembly cannot be found in the implementation directories. Default is to error and not do anlysis

inputs.name: generateLog
inputs.label: Create Comparison result log
inputs.helpMarkDown: If selected, a log will be created with the result of the comparisson

inputs.name: outputFilename
inputs.label: Output file name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the folder that will contain the output files

inputs.name: outputFolder
inputs.label: Output file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the folder that will contain the output files

inputs.name: useBaseline
inputs.label: Use baseline file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allows the use of a file with known differences to ignore when comparing
